title: So where is Gragas supposed to be played now?
body:
I've seen mid, top, jungle and even support...

After so many changes, where is he best at now?


Or is he still worth playing?

replies.body: I have seen him played as a support so many times. Really ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥  annoying with his constant and large hitbox poke.

Gragas is in a %%%% spot right now

ranged top meta doesn't do well on graggy.

ok at jungle i think, haven't touch in a while.

q doesn't 1 shot casters at mid anymore , there are better mid laners.

Support takes more knowledge to play. 


He takes a bit of knowledge to play well, not an easy champ

Gragas is in a strange position, some people go Roa + Morrelo and act as an Ap bruiser top, the problem is they do to little dmg, and die quite fast. 
If you decide to go full tank after that, with inclusion of IBG, your cds are so long so once you burn a full combo you are being kited to oblivion by the enemy marksman/ap mid until they come back up.

Gragas can be messed a lot with too, if you e in and don't land on anyone or get anyone near you with ult, you generally get kited really hard.. 
His w is way too clunky...

Far better choices like Lissandra, Gnar, Renekton, Trundle, Jax, J4, Irelia, etc.

The thing is, his a niche pick for his ult, and even that can somewhat be picked up by another champ (Janna ult)

If you were to main him, sure he'd be decent, and honestly he can run any lane (i would say top and tanky would be most reasonable) but there are other champs that do the same sort of stuff that aren't underpowered thanks to rito.
I'd say support is the most useful role for him. He can peel really well, and he can body block stuff too with his fat belly. His CC makes him really "fit" for the job (punz)
Well, taking Gragas in any role, it just seems that there are much better suited champions that can do what he does, but better. (**In My Opinion**)
I thought that was the case of him being so underplayed right now (well, I haven’t seen one in so long so yeah)
